title: How to Use Garlic Scapes

steps.headline: Check that the scape is curled.
steps.description: If the scape is straight, it will be tough and inedible. The scape must be curled, with a yellow-green stalk and a white, tender bulb.

steps.headline: Trim off any tough ends, or stringy pieces.
Add to dishes.
steps.description: Garlic scapes are great for salads or for cooked food. Raw - the garlic scapes will taste hot and peppery. Cooked - the garlic scapes will mellow and taste much sweeter.

text: Check that the scape is curled. If the scape is straight, it will be tough and inedible. The scape must be curled, with a yellow-green stalk and a white, tender bulb. Trim off any tough ends, or stringy pieces. Remove any yellowed flower tips. Add to dishes. Garlic scapes are great for salads or for cooked food. Raw - the garlic scapes will taste hot and peppery. Cooked - the garlic scapes will mellow and taste much sweeter.
